tool_description: Get all information from "amazon.in" in JSON format with ease.
name: Amazon India Scraper
title: Amazon India Scraper

api_list.name: Search Results
api_list.description:
This is the most useful endpoint of the Api.
It returns the search results on amazon.in for certain string in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com/search/IPad Pro"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Product Offers
api_list.description: Returns the different offers available for a product.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08L5WHFT9/offers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}/offers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Product Reviews

api_list.name: Product Details
api_list.description:
Returns Product Details for specified product code.
The details include price, seller, colors, options, ratings, etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08L5WHFT9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
